column3: second of the Series 5 Mixels of the Frosticons Tribe.

column1: This guy really stands out as full of character and articulation. Those 2 little black bows as eyebrows really give him character and great expressions.

column2: socket joints, claws, clips, and trans blue and medium azur pieces make him a good source of pieces too.

column1: I really love this guy, those eyebrows really give him great expression, and his claws and many ball&
column2: sockets joints give him great poseability.
s definitely one of my favourite Mixels of all.
